about_the_game:
Welcome to "Pyxole," a vibrant world of creativity and imagination where pixel art reigns supreme! Dive into an endless universe of user-generated content, crafting your very own pixel art characters and worlds or exploring the incredible creations of others. "Pyxole" is not just a game; it's a community of artists, storytellers, and dreamers. Whether you're recreating nostalgic characters from your favorite games or inventing entirely new landscapes, "Pyxole" provides the tools and canvas for your creativity to run wild.

In "Pyxole," your only limit is your imagination. Join servers where different universes collide—where a pixelated version of a classic hero might wander into a dystopian pixel city or a whimsical fantasy forest. Share your creations with the world, download others' masterpieces, or collaborate to build expansive, interactive worlds. "Pyxole" is the ultimate playground for pixel art enthusiasts and those who love to create, share, and engage with a global community.

content_descriptors.notes:
Content Advisory for Players

Our game is a vibrant community-driven experience where players share their creativity through pixel art, exploring a wide range of characters and worlds. We're dedicated to fostering an inclusive environment and recognize the diversity of our player base. Herein, we outline the mature content you may encounter in the game:

Nudity and Sexual Content:
The game allows the creation and sharing of pixel art, which may include depictions of nudity in certain contexts. All such content is tagged as NSFW (Not Safe For Work) and can be censored based on player preference. However, it's important to note that while artistic freedom is valued, we strictly prohibit explicit sexual acts or content that depicts sexual violence or non-consensual acts.

Violence:
Players may encounter depictions of violence in pixel art creations. While the pixel art style may abstract these depictions, sensitive players should be aware that themes of conflict or violence can be present.

Sensitive Themes:
Our platform recognizes that certain topics can be particularly sensitive for some players. As such, content that may depict or reference drug and alcohol abuse, self-harm, or other forms of physical or psychological trauma is closely monitored. While our community is encouraged to express a wide range of human experiences, we strive to do so in a way that's respectful and considerate of all players.

Content Filters and Controls:
We understand that everyone has different comfort levels and sensitivities. Our platform offers robust content filtering options, including the ability to censor NSFW content or completely avoid specific themes. We encourage players to customize their content preferences for a comfortable gaming experience.

Community Guidelines and Reporting:
Our community guidelines are in place to ensure a safe and welcoming environment for all players. We actively moderate the platform and rely on our community to report any content that may violate our guidelines. Our team takes swift action to review and address any issues, upholding a respectful and inclusive community space.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics or equivalent)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any standard sound card or onboard audio
  • VR Support: Not applicable
  • Additional Notes: An internet speed of 1MB/s is recommended
